6.1.hd_quote: The Realization that wasting one's resources against overwhelming odds is not courage but folly.
6.1.behavioral_axis: Waits to assess intimacy through the emotional wave, recognizing both weakness and strength before engaging in bonding.
6.1.shadow_axis: Rushes into intimacy without retreat, becoming emotionally unstable when the wave shifts from strength to weakness.
6.1.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

6.2.hd_quote: The ability to maximize an inferior position
6.2.behavioral_axis: Called out for ability to find emotional weak points, advancing or withdrawing based on projection without examining intimacy's nature.
6.2.shadow_axis: Lunges kamikaze-style into relationships blindly or withdraws aggressively, lacking sensitivity that blunders into non-productive conflicts.
6.2.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

6.3.hd_quote: The destruction of old forms through union
6.3.behavioral_axis: Experiments with bonds made and broken through trial and error, bringing new genetic material into the tribe through diverse intimacy.
6.3.shadow_axis: Rejects allegiance as submission to established order, becomes sensitive to control that eventually rejects intimacy completely.
6.3.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

6.4.hd_quote: A position of natural and unchallengeable power.
6.4.behavioral_axis: Externalizes emotional power to dominate the relationship field, requiring friendship as foundation before penetrating intimacy.
6.4.shadow_axis: Lacks emotional control that becomes destructive, overwhelming others with kindness then flipping to meanness through the wave.
6.4.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

6.5.hd_quote: Time is the only authority that will allow clear assessment of the nature of any intimacy.
6.5.behavioral_axis: Holds projection field that seduces intimacy maintainable over time, sensitive to whether relationships serve mutual harmony through emotional wave.
6.5.shadow_axis: Performs arbitrator role to satisfy projections, insensitive to others' concerns, only accepts judgment if victor in the conflict.
6.5.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

6.6.hd_quote: The highest form of reason is that life is sacred.
6.6.behavioral_axis: Considers objectively what world children will live in before engaging intimacy, setting conditions for emotional quality of relationship from roof perspective.
6.6.shadow_axis: Sets unacceptable terms for intimacy, emotionally controls relationship only after conditions satisfied, apathetic to partner's understanding of why.
6.6.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks
